CONDITION_INCAPACITATED.description: The result of having 0 HP. Being unable to do anything

CONDITION_PARALYZED.description: Cause by spells or grasp. Prevent from doing anything, except seeing. This is a body affliction.

CONDITION_STUNNED.description: Caused by spells, psionic, shock, explosion. Prevent from doing anything, except seeing. This is a mind affliction.

CONDITION_RESTRAINED.description: Caused by entanglement. Prevent from fleeing or approaching

CONDITION_CONFUSED.description: Cause by spells, gases, charms. Prevent from doing hostile actions and fleeing

CONDITION_FRIGHTENED.description: Caused by spells, auras. Prevent from doing hostile actions

CONDITION_BLINDED.description: Caused by spells, spits, Prevent from seeing and casting spell on target

CONDITION_POISONED.description: Damage over time with poison damage, will give disadvantages
